Package projectone.demo.controller

Class ProductsController

java.lang.Object
projectone.demo.controller.ProductsController
@RequestMapping("manager") @Controller public class ProductsController extends Object
Controller for managing products within a manager's role.

  • Method Details

    • products

      @GetMapping String products(org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.ui.Model modelJunc, org.springframework.ui.Model modelinventory)
      Displays all products, inventory junctions, and inventory items.
      Parameters:
      model - Model to pass products to the view.
      modelJunc - Model to pass inventory junctions.
      modelinventory - Model to pass inventory items.
      Returns:
      View name for the manager page.

    • delete

      @ResponseBody @DeleteMapping(value="/{id}", produces="text/html") String delete(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a product and its associated inventory junctions.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the product to delete.
      Returns:
      A response body indicator (empty string in this case).

    • add

      @PostMapping("/add") String add(@RequestParam("new-productsName") String name, @RequestParam("new-productsPrice") String price, @RequestParam("new-productsType") String type, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.ui.Model modelJunc, org.springframework.ui.Model modelinventory)
      Adds a new product with specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the new product.
      price - Price of the new product.
      type - Type of the new product.
      model - Model to update products list.
      modelJunc - Model to update junctions.
      modelinventory - Model to update inventory items.
      Returns:
      Thymeleaf fragment for the manager list.

    • addInv

      @PostMapping("/addInv") String addInv(@RequestParam("new-inv-id") String invId, @RequestParam("id") String prodId, org.springframework.ui.Model modelJunc)
      Adds a new inventory junction for a product.
      Parameters:
      invId - Inventory ID to associate with the product.
      prodId - Product ID for the new junction.
      modelJunc - Model to update junctions.
      Returns:
      Redirect to the manager page.

    • removeInv

      @PostMapping("/removeInv") String removeInv(@RequestParam("remove") String remove, org.springframework.ui.Model modelJunc)
      Removes an inventory junction.
      Parameters:
      remove - ID of the junction to remove.
      modelJunc - Model to update junctions.
      Returns:
      Redirect to the manager page.

    • update

      @PostMapping String update(@RequestParam("new-name") String name, @RequestParam("new-price") String price, @RequestParam("new-item") String type, @RequestParam("id") String id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Updates a product's details.
      Parameters:
      name - New name for the product.
      price - New price for the product.
      type - New type for the product.
      id - ID of the product to update.
      model - Model to update products list.
      Returns:
      Redirect to the manager page.
